title: Kaia Gerber looks all done up as she shows off her edgy street style while out and about in New York
text:
Kaia Gerber knows how to start the week off on the right foot.

The 18-year-old stepped out with her hair all done up while out-and-about in New York City outside of the Highline Stages.

She cut a chic figure as she carried a tan cardigan and a small black handbag as she headed about her day.

Looking good: Kaia Gerber stepped out with her hair all done up while out-and-about in New York City outside of the Highline Stages

For her day out in the city, she wore a black leather jacket that she's been rotating in her closet for the fall season.

She had on a pair of black leggings and a pair of black, leather knee-high boots to finish off the look.

Her short brunette hair was swept to the side in a dramatic side part with loads of volume. She even made sure to elevate the look with a pair of skinny sleek sunglasses.

New York street style: Her short brunette hair was swept to the side in a dramatic side part with loads of volume. She even made sure to elevate the look with a pair of skinny sleek sunglasses

The model's errand run comes after being spotted out on a date with Pete Davidson, 25.

They were spotted out grabbing some lunch last week at Sadelle's after TMZ reports Pete was also spotted leaving her apartment the next day.

Neither Kaia nor Pete have made a comment about the possible new relationship.

Out and about: Kaia looked glamorous as she stepped out in the city on Monday morning while carrying her little black bag and a tan top

Kaia's fame shot up when she entered the modeling industry following in the footsteps of her famous mother Cindy Crawford and father Rande Gerber.

She got her first modeling contract back when she was just 13 years old and made her first runway debut for Calvin Klein just years later when she was 16.

Now, she is a regular on the runway and around the world during fashion week and is represented by DNA Model Management.
description:
Kaia Gerber knows how to start the week off on the right foot.
The 18-year-old stepped out with her hair all done up while out-and-about in New York City outside of the Highline Stages.
